about_the_game:
Danger Scavenger - Original Game Soundtrack

This soundtrack constitute conflicting emotions. A beautiful electronic drifts through industrial scapes vs their energetic counterparts, accompanying rooftop boss-fights. A trip.

SZYMON WEISS
Producer of unruly electronic music (bordering with techno), currently merges it with grand electronic-symphonic show Weiss Video Orchestra and performs with a 16 people chamber orchestra. Music production and engineering teacher at Warsaw’s Instytut Dźwięku. Film scores (among others for J. J. Skolimowski, or P. Kielar). Commercial scores for CI Games, European Solidarity Center, National Chamber of Commerce, Academy of Fine Arts. Numerous jingles for festivals or radio.

How to play downloaded Soundtrack DLC:
1. Please select Music from the Library tab in the Steam client.
2. From the list of available albums, choose Danger Scavenger - Soundtrack.
3. Press the PLAY ALBUM button to start the Steam music player

How to find Soundtrack files:
1. Please select Music from the Library tab in the Steam client.
2. From the list of available albums, choose Danger Scavenger - Soundtrack.
3. Choose the SHOW IN SYSTEM below PLAY ALBUM button to open the folder with the Soundtrack files in mp3 format.
